metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12982 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Invalid memory read in the PoDoFo::PdfVariant::DelayedLoad() function in PdfVariant.h in PoDoFo 0.9.6-rc1 allows remote attackers to have denial-of-service impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.6+dfsg-5').
